metadata.title: Awesome Geophysics
metadata.description: A community-curated collection of geophysical resources including software, datasets, educational materials, and more. `Test`

categories.name: Software and Tools
categories.description: Enhance your geophysical workflows with these essential software solutions:

resources.name: EQcorrscan
resources.description: A python package for the detection and analysis of repeating and near-repeating earthquakes.

resources.name: Auralib
resources.description: Python package to support investigation of geoscience problems including geophysics, rock physics, petrophysics, and data read/write in common formats.

resources.name: bh_tomo
resources.description: Numba-accelerated computation of surface wave dispersion.

resources.name: Bruges
resources.description: Various geophysical equations and tools.

resources.name: celeri
resources.description: A python-based package designed to image earthquake cycle activity including the spatial and time varying fault coupling across geometrically complex fault systems at large scales.

resources.name: deepwave
resources.description: Deepwave provides wave propagation modules for PyTorch, for applications such as seismic imaging/inversion. You can use it to perform forward modelling and backpropagation.

resources.name: disba
resources.description: Borehole radar and seismic tomography package.

resources.name: emsig
resources.description: Controlled-source electromagnetic modellers for layered (`empymod`) and three-dimensional (`emg3d`) anisotropic media.

resources.name: Fatiando a Terra
resources.description: A Python toolkit for geophysical modeling, ideal for addressing gravity, magnetics, and seismic challenges.

resources.name: first_break_picking
resources.description: A Python package for automatic first break picking in seismic data using deep learning.

resources.name: Front End
resources.description: Preprocess seismic data with various functions, such as resampling, vertical stacking, nodal data assembling, trace swapping, and format conversion.

resources.name: Geoelectricspy
resources.description: An interactive 3D visualization tool for subsurface resistivity data—perfect for understanding geoelectric structures.

resources.name: GeoPhyInv
resources.description: Julia Toolbox for Geophysical Modeling and Inverse Problems.

resources.name: Geopsy
resources.description: A tool for processing ambient vibration data, widely used in site characterization and microzonation studies.

resources.name: GemPy
resources.description: 3-D structural geological modelling software with implicit modelling and support for stochastic modelling.

resources.name: GMT (Generic Mapping Tools)
resources.description: A robust toolset for creating high-quality maps and plots used across geoscience disciplines.

resources.name: gprMax
resources.description: A comprehensive Python library for seismology, perfect for waveform analysis, data handling, and visualization.

resources.name: GPRPy
resources.description: Multi-format, GUI-based GPR processing and visualization.

resources.name: GSadjust
resources.description: GSadjust is a cross-platform graphical interface for processing relative gravity surveys. It provides an interface for data selection, drift evaluation and correction, network adjustment, and integrating data from modern relative (Scintrex, ZLS) and absolute (Micro-g Lacoste) gravity meters.

resources.name: hypopy
resources.description: HYPOcenter location from arrival time data in PYthon.

resources.name: hvsrpy
resources.description: A Python package for horizontal-to-vertical spectral ratio processing.

resources.name: Madagascar
resources.description: An open-source platform designed for reproducible geophysical data processing and analysis.

resources.name: MDIO
resources.description: Open source chunked and compressed cloud storage for seismic data based on Zarr with fast seismic ingestion and export tools – [Docs](https://mdio-python.readthedocs.io), [Source](https://github.com/TGSAI/mdio-python).

resources.name: modelr.io
resources.description: Web app for simple synthetic seismic forward modelling.

resources.name: OpendTect-Plugins
resources.description: Open source plugins for the OpendTect seismic interpretation platform. See [the docs](http://waynegm.github.io/OpendTect-Plugin-Docs) for more information.

resources.name: OpenSeaSeis
resources.description: Seismic workflow generator and seismic viewer.

resources.name: ObsPy
resources.description: A comprehensive Python library for seismology, perfect for waveform analysis, data handling, and visualization.

resources.name: Pastas
resources.description: Open-source Python framework for the analysis of groundwater time series.

resources.name: pyekfmm
resources.description: A python package for 3D fast-marching-based traveltime calculation and its applications in seismology.

resources.name: PyFWI
resources.description: It can be used to perform full-waveform inversion (FWI) and time-lapse FWI of seismic data.

resources.name: pyGeoPressure
resources.description: Pore pressure prediction using well log data and seismic velocity data.

resources.name: PyGIMLi
resources.description: A library for geophysical inversion and modeling with an emphasis on ease of use.

resources.name: PyLops
resources.description: Linear Operators with some geophysics/seismic modules (e.g., pre- and post-stack AVO inversion, deconvolution, Marchenko redatuming, Radon filtering).

resources.name: Pyrocko
resources.description: A toolkit for seismic waveform analysis and earthquake modeling.

resources.name: PySeis
resources.description: Pure python seismic data processing

resources.name: PySIT
resources.description: A Toolbox for seismic inversion and seismic imaging.

resources.name: pyVDS
resources.description: Convenience wrapper around Bluware's OpenVDS+ Python bindings which enables reading of VDS files with a syntax familiar to users of segyio.

resources.name: pyZGY
resources.description: Convenience wrapper around Schlumberger's OpenZGY Python package which enables reading of ZGY files with a syntax familiar to users of segyio.

resources.name: R2
resources.description: A forward/inverse solution for 3D or 2D current flow in quadrilateral or triangular meshes.

resources.name: RAGU
resources.description: Radar interpretation GUI compatible with multiple radar datasets.

resources.name: readgssi
resources.description: Fast command line or console-based visualization, filtering, and translation of GSSI radar data.

resources.name: RedPy
resources.description: Auto-clustering for seismic events.

resources.name: RECAST
resources.description: Flexible and Scalable Earthquake Forecasting.

resources.name: Refrapy
resources.description: A program for seismic refraction data processing.

resources.name: RGPR
resources.description: Reads, exports, processes, and plots ground-penetrating radar data.

resources.name: ResIPy
resources.description: A Python wrapper around the R2 family of codes (for 2D/3D DC/IP inversion).

resources.name: rsudp
resources.description: Continuous ObsPy-based visual display, sudden motion monitoring, and historical replay of Raspberry Shake data.

resources.name: SAC (Seismic Analysis Code)
resources.description: A go-to tool for seismic waveform analysis, offering powerful data manipulation for seismologists worldwide.

resources.name: SeisComp
resources.description: Seismic observatory automation toolkit. Autodetection, storage, sharing, processing data and more.

resources.name: Seismic_BPMF
resources.description: Complete framework for earthquake detection and location: Backprojection and matched-filtering (BPMF), with methods for automatic picking, relocation and efficient waveform stacking.

resources.name: SeisUnix
resources.description: A classic suite for seismic reflection data processing, widely used in both academia and industry.

resources.name: SeisWiz
resources.description: The ultimate lightweight Matplotlib-based seismic volume viewer with multi-view support and horizon visualization capabilities.

resources.name: Segyio
resources.description: Fast library for seismic SEGY files.

resources.name: Seismic Un*x
resources.description: A powerful toolkit for seismic data processing.

resources.name: SeismicZFP
resources.description: Convert SEG-Y/ZGY files to compressed [SGZ files](https://github.com/equinor/seismic-zfp/blob/master/docs/file-specification.md) & retrieve arbitrary sub-volumes from these, fast.

resources.name: spyro
resources.description: Seismic parallel inversion and reconstruction optimization framework

resources.name: synthoseis
resources.description: Synthoseis is an open-source, Python-based tool used for generating pseudo-random seismic data.

resources.name: swprocess
resources.description: A Python package for surface wave processing.

resources.name: Surfer
resources.description: A contouring and 3D mapping software, great for visualizing subsurface geophysical data.

resources.name: SWIT
resources.description: Seismic Waveform Inversion Toolbox (SWIT-1.0) is a 2-D acoustic Full-waveform Inversion (FWI) package implemented in Fortran and Python.

resources.name: veros
resources.description: Veros, *the versatile ocean simulator*, aims to be the swiss army knife of ocean modeling. It is a full-fledged primitive equation ocean model that supports anything between idealized toy models and [realistic, high-resolution, global ocean simulations](https://agupubs.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1029/2021MS002717).

resources.name: XTgeo
resources.description: Python library with C backend to support manipulation of (oil industry) subsurface reservoir modelling.

categories.name: Datasets and Databases
categories.description: Access raw and processed geophysical data from reputable sources:

resources.name: IRIS Data Management Center
resources.description: A comprehensive repository of seismic data from global networks, crucial for earthquake and tectonics studies.

resources.name: USGS Earthquake Hazards Program
resources.description: Provides real-time and historical earthquake data along with hazard maps for seismic research.

resources.name: NGDC (National Geophysical Data Center)
resources.description: A vast archive of geophysical data—think marine gravity, terrestrial magnetics, and bathymetry. Now part of NOAA's NCEI.

resources.name: NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI)
resources.description: A goldmine of geomagnetic, gravity, and climate data—ideal for interdisciplinary geophysical studies.

resources.name: International Seismological Centre (ISC)
resources.description: The ultimate catalog of seismic events worldwide, with detailed phase data for researchers.

resources.name: Global Seismographic Network (GSN)
resources.description: High-quality seismic recordings for deep Earth studies.

resources.name: Poseidon NW Australia
resources.description: Interpreted 3D seismic (32bit) including reports and well logs.

resources.name: SEG Open Data Catalog
resources.description: Catalog of "geophysical data that is readily available for download from the internet, via mail, or through special request", maintained by the Society of Exploration Geophysicists.

resources.name: GeoMapApp
resources.description: GeoMapApp is a map-based application for browsing, visualizing and analyzing a diverse suite of curated global and regional geoscience data sets.

resources.name: Quantarctica
resources.description: The Quantarctica data package comprises Antarctic geographic data from data centres worldwide – all wrapped in a project file that works on QGIS.

resources.name: TerraNubis
resources.description: TerraNubis is a cloud-based portal for buying, selling and interpreting seismic data sets and interpretations.

resources.name: ICGEM
resources.description: Hosts gravity field spherical harmonic models and provides a webservice for generating grids of gravity functionals (geoid, gravity anomaly, vertical derivatives, etc).

categories.name: Educational Resources
categories.description: Build and refine your geophysics knowledge with these top-tier learning materials:

subcategories.name: Textbooks
subcategories.description: Comprehensive learning materials covering various aspects of geophysics:

subcategories.name: Fundamentals of Seismology and Earth Structure
subcategories.description: Essential reading for understanding seismic wave theory and earthquake science:

resources.name: Introduction to Seismology by Peter Shearer
resources.description: A comprehensive guide to seismic wave theory and earthquake science, ideal for students and professionals seeking a solid foundation in seismology.

resources.name: Quantitative Seismology by Keiiti Aki and Paul G. Richards
resources.description: A rigorous and mathematical treatment of seismology, covering wave propagation, earthquake source mechanisms, and data interpretation.

resources.name: Theoretical Global Seismology by F.A. Dahlen and Jeroen Tromp
resources.description: A rigorous treatment of global seismology, wave propagation, and normal mode theory.

resources.name: The Seismic Analysis Code: A Primer and User's Guide by George Helffrich, Ian Bastow and James Wookey
resources.description: A practical guide to using the SAC software for seismic data processing, widely used in academic and industry research.

resources.name: Fundamentals of Geophysics by William Lowrie
resources.description: A well-structured introduction to the principles of geophysics, with clear explanations of gravity, magnetism, and seismology.

resources.name: Modern Global Seismology by Thorne Lay and Terry C. Wallace
resources.description: Explains the principles of seismology at a global scale, including earthquake dynamics and deep Earth structure.

subcategories.name: Geodynamics and Earth's Interior
subcategories.description: Exploration of Earth's tectonic processes and deep structure:

resources.name: Geodynamics by Donald Turcotte and Gerald Schubert
resources.description: An in-depth exploration of Earth's tectonic processes, mantle convection, and planetary evolution.

resources.name: The Solid Earth by C.M.R. Fowler
resources.description: A broad geophysics textbook covering seismology, gravity, geomagnetism, and heat flow.

resources.name: Earth Structure: An Introduction to Structural Geology and Tectonics by Ben A. van der Pluijm and Stephen Marshak
resources.description: Explores the deformation of Earth's crust and lithosphere, combining geophysics and geology.

subcategories.name: Exploration Geophysics
subcategories.description: Resources for applied geophysics in exploration and industry:

resources.name: Exploration Seismology by Sheriff and Geldart
resources.description: The bible of seismic exploration—perfect for applied geophysicists in the oil, gas, and mineral industries.

resources.name: Applied Geophysics by W. M. Telford, L. P. Geldart, and R. E. Sheriff
resources.description: Covers all major geophysical methods, including gravity, magnetics, electrical resistivity, and seismic exploration.

resources.name: Fundamentals of Geophysical Data Processing by Jon F. Claerbout
resources.description: A classic text on digital signal processing techniques in seismic imaging.

resources.name: Gravity and Magnetic Exploration: Principles, Practices, and Applications by William J. Hinze, Ralph R. B. von Frese, and Afif H. Saad
resources.description: An essential resource for understanding potential field geophysics in mineral and hydrocarbon exploration.

resources.name: Principles of Geophysical Exploration by D.S. Parasnis
resources.description: A solid introduction to geophysical exploration methods, with an emphasis on data interpretation.

subcategories.name: Mathematical and Computational Geophysics
subcategories.description: Advanced mathematical and computational techniques for geophysical analysis:

resources.name: Inverse Problem Theory and Methods for Model Parameter Estimation by Albert Tarantola
resources.description: A must-read for geophysicists working with inverse modeling, parameter estimation, and uncertainty analysis.

resources.name: Geophysical Data Analysis: Discrete Inverse Theory by William Menke
resources.description: Covers mathematical techniques for solving inverse problems in geophysics.

resources.name: Numerical Methods of Exploration Seismology by Gary F. Margrave
resources.description: A concise look at applying machine learning to seismic interpretation, geophysical inversion, and subsurface exploration using advanced numerical methods.

resources.name: Computational Seismology: A Practical Introduction by Heiner Igel
resources.description: Provides a hands-on approach to numerical methods in seismology, including wave equation solvers and finite difference techniques.

resources.name: Global Optimization Methods in Geophysical Inversion by Mrinal K. Sen and Paul L. Stoffa
resources.description: Essential for those working on inversion problems in geophysics, with a focus on optimization techniques.

subcategories.name: Specialized Topics in Geophysics
subcategories.description: Focused resources on specific geophysical sub-disciplines:

resources.name: Seismic Tomography: Theory and Practice by H.M. Iyer and K. Hirahara
resources.description: A foundational book on seismic tomography methods used to image Earth's interior.

resources.name: Plate Tectonics: A Very Short Introduction by Peter Molnar
resources.description: A concise introduction to the principles of plate tectonics and its geophysical implications.

resources.name: Electromagnetic Methods in Applied Geophysics by Misac N. Nabighian
resources.description: A definitive reference on electromagnetic techniques for subsurface imaging and mineral exploration.

resources.name: An Introduction to Applied and Environmental Geophysics by John M. Reynolds
resources.description: Focuses on the use of geophysical methods in environmental and engineering applications.

resources.name: Geomagnetism by Masaru Kono
resources.description: Covers the physics of the Earth's magnetic field, paleomagnetism, and dynamo theory.

resources.name: Gravity and Magnetic Exploration, Principles, Practices, and Applications by William J. Hinze, Ralph R. B. von Frese and Afif H. Saad
resources.description: A succinct overview of gravity and magnetic exploration, covering core principles, practical techniques, and their applications in geophysical studies.

subcategories.name: Online Courses and Tutorials
subcategories.description: Expand your knowledge with these online courses and tutorials:

resources.name: ErSE 210 Seismology course
resources.description: Teaching material for ErSE 210 Seismology course *GitHub Repo*.

resources.name: Remote Online Sessions for Emerging Seismologists (ROSES)
resources.description: Targeted towards advanced Ph.D. students, who have used Python before and are familiar navigating in Linux/Unix. Lectures cover topics at the intersection of Seismology and Data Science.

resources.name: Theory-of-seismic-waves-II
resources.description: Course material for the lecture `Theory of seismic waves II` (SS 2019) at the Institute of Geosciences (Department of Geophysics), Christian-Albrechts-University Kiel

subcategories.name: Workshops and Webinars
subcategories.description: Interactive learning opportunities from leading institutions:

resources.name: Annual Seismology Skill Building Workshop for Undergraduates
resources.description: Organized by Miami University and EarthScope Consortium.

subcategories.name: University Programs and Certificates
subcategories.description: Explore graduate programs, summer schools, and certificate courses in geosciences for deeper academic training.

categories.name: Research Papers and Journals
categories.description: Keep abreast of the latest discoveries and methods in geophysics:

resources.name: Geophysical Research Letters
resources.description: Rapid publications presenting high-impact research across various geophysical fields.

resources.name: Geophysics
resources.description: The leading journal for applied geophysics and exploration techniques.

resources.name: EarthArXiv
resources.description: A preprint server for cutting-edge geophysical research prior to formal publication.

resources.name: Geophysics Cheat Sheet
resources.description: Cheat Sheet for Geophysics.

resources.name: Rock Physics Cheat Sheet
resources.description: Cheat Sheet for Rock Physics.

resources.name: Petroleum Science Cheat Sheet
resources.description: Cheat Sheet for Petroleum Science.

categories.name: Organizations and Societies
categories.description: Network with leading experts, researchers, and industry professionals in geophysics through these key organizations:

subcategories.name: Global Organizations
subcategories.description: International organizations supporting geophysical research and collaboration:

resources.name: American Geophysical Union (AGU)
resources.description: A hub for geoscientists offering resources, events, and professional networking across disciplines.

resources.name: Society of Exploration Geophysicists (SEG)
resources.description: Focused on applied geophysics, providing conferences, training, and publications.

resources.name: Seismological Society of America (SSA)
resources.description: Specializing in earthquake science and research with valuable educational resources.

resources.name: European Association of Geoscientists and Engineers (EAGE)
resources.description: Offers training, research, and networking opportunities for geoscience professionals.

resources.name: International Association of Geodesy (IAG)
resources.description: Covers geophysical research related to Earth's gravity, rotation, and deformation.

resources.name: International Association of Seismology and Physics of the Earth's Interior (IASPEI)
resources.description: Advances global seismology and deep Earth studies.

resources.name: International Union of Geodesy and Geophysics (IUGG)
resources.description: A collective body supporting geophysical research worldwide.

subcategories.name: Regional and National Societies
subcategories.description: Regional organizations supporting geophysical research and professionals:

resources.name: National Institute of Geological Sciences (NIGS)
resources.description: Based in the Philippines, dedicated to geophysical and geological research and education.

resources.name: National Iranian Geophysics Society (NIGS)
resources.description: Nonprofit organization for geophysicists and engineers. It is an organization providing a national network of geoscientists and academic professionals.

resources.name: Australian Society of Exploration Geophysicists (ASEG)
resources.description: A professional body for geophysicists working in exploration and mining.

resources.name: Canadian Society of Exploration Geophysicists (CSEG)
resources.description: Provides networking, education, and professional development for geophysicists in Canada.

resources.name: Geological Society of London (GSL)
resources.description: One of the world's oldest geological societies, supporting geophysics research.

resources.name: Indian Geophysical Union (IGU)
resources.description: Focuses on geophysical research in seismology, hydrology, and geodynamics.

resources.name: Brazilian Geophysical Society (SBGf)
resources.description: Organizes geophysics-related events, research, and publications in South America.

resources.name: Russian Geophysical Society (RGS)
resources.description: A key organization for seismic and electromagnetic research in Russia.

resources.name: Chinese Geophysical Society (CGS)
resources.description: Promotes geophysical advancements and collaboration in China.

subcategories.name: Professional Networks and Communities
subcategories.description: Online platforms and communities for geophysics professionals:

resources.name: LinkedIn Groups
resources.description: Join geophysics-related groups on LinkedIn to network and share knowledge.

resources.name: ResearchGate
resources.description: Connect with researchers, share publications, and collaborate on geophysical projects.

resources.name: Academic Mailing Lists
resources.description: Join geophysics-focused lists like IRIS Seismology, SEG’s Technical Sections, and EAGE’s Discussion Groups.

categories.name: Conferences and Events
categories.description: Stay connected with the latest advancements through these key events:

resources.name: AGU Fall Meeting
resources.description: The world's largest geoscience conference featuring hundreds of sessions, workshops, and networking opportunities.

resources.name: SEG Annual Meeting
resources.description: A premier event showcasing the latest in exploration geophysics, technology innovations, and research.

resources.name: SSA Annual Meeting
resources.description: Focused on earthquake science and the latest seismological research.

resources.name: European Geosciences Union General Assembly
resources.description: A massive European event covering all things Earth and planetary science.

categories.name: Blogs, Podcasts, and Community Forums
categories.description: Engage with the geophysics community through diverse media channels:

subcategories.name: Blogs
subcategories.description: Regularly updated blogs covering geophysical topics and research:

resources.name: AGU Blogosphere
resources.description: Hosted by the American Geophysical Union, this platform offers a diverse collection of blogs discussing the latest developments in geoscience and geophysics.

resources.name: Geophysics Rocks
resources.description: An engaging blog that breaks down complex geophysical concepts in an accessible way.

resources.name: Geophysical Insights Blog
resources.description: Features articles on machine learning applications in geophysical data analysis and other contemporary topics.

resources.name: Geology & Geophysics Blog – University of Southampton
resources.description: Provides insights into recent research, fieldwork, and developments in geology and geophysics.

resources.name: Geophysics Blog – University of Texas Institute for Geophysics
resources.description: Shares updates on research projects, field studies, and scientific findings in geophysics.

resources.name: 20 Best Geophysics Blogs and Websites
resources.description: A curated list of top geophysics blogs, providing a broad spectrum of perspectives and topics in the field.

subcategories.name: Technical Blogs
subcategories.description: Technical resources and advanced geophysical discussions:

resources.name: Fundamentals of Geophysical Data Processing - Stanford Exploration Project
resources.description: Offers comprehensive insights into geophysical data processing techniques.

resources.name: Machine Learning Applications to Geophysical Data Analysis - UBC
resources.description: Explores the integration of machine learning in geophysical data analysis.

resources.name: Data-Driven Geophysics: From Dictionary Learning to Deep Learning
resources.description: A scholarly article discussing the evolution of data-driven approaches in geophysics.

resources.name: Deep Learning for Geophysics: Current and Future Trends
resources.description: Reviews the application of deep learning techniques in geophysical research.

resources.name: Subsurface Mapping by Ambient Noise Tomography
resources.description: Provides an overview of ambient noise tomography techniques used in subsurface mapping.

subcategories.name: Podcasts
subcategories.description: Audio content featuring geophysical discussions and interviews:

resources.name: Seismic Soundoff
resources.description: Hosted by the Society of Exploration Geophysicists (SEG), this podcast offers in-depth conversations on applied geophysics, addressing challenges in energy, water, and climate.

resources.name: Third Pod from the Sun
resources.description: Presented by the American Geophysical Union, this podcast delves into the stories behind the science, offering insights into various geoscience topics.

resources.name: Sci & Tell
resources.description: Another offering from the American Geophysical Union, this podcast features interviews and first-person stories from scientists, providing a personal perspective on scientific endeavors.

resources.name: Oxford University Geophysics Podcasts
resources.description: The University of Oxford provides a series of podcasts featuring discussions on various geophysics topics, including carbon storage and mathematical aspects of the planet.

subcategories.name: Community Forums and Social Media
subcategories.description: Platforms for discussion and networking in geophysics:

resources.name: Society of Exploration Geophysicists (SEG) Online Communities
resources.description: SEG offers various online platforms, including forums and social media groups, where professionals can discuss topics related to exploration geophysics.

resources.name: Reddit Communities
resources.description: Subreddits like r/geophysics and r/geology provide platforms for discussions, Q&A, and sharing the latest research and news in the field.

resources.name: LinkedIn Groups
resources.description: Professional groups such as "Geophysics Forum" and "Exploration Geophysics" on LinkedIn offer opportunities to connect with industry experts, participate in discussions, and stay updated on industry trends.

resources.name: Geophysics Forums
resources.description: Dedicated forums like the Geophysics Forum provide spaces to ask questions, share knowledge, and engage in discussions specific to geophysics.

categories.name: Career and Professional Development
categories.description: Advance your geophysical career with these resources:

resources.name: AGU Career Center
resources.description: Job listings, career advice, and networking opportunities tailored for geoscientists.

resources.name: SEG Career Resources
resources.description: Tools for professional development including mentoring programs, workshops, and job postings.

categories.name: Industry News and Updates
categories.description: Stay informed with the latest trends, breakthroughs, and market news in geophysics:

subcategories.name: Industry Publications
subcategories.description: Publications covering geophysical industry news and developments:

resources.name: EAGE's First Break
resources.description: Covers applied geoscience topics, case studies, and research developments.

resources.name: SEG News
resources.description: Provides updates on geophysical exploration, technology, and society news.

resources.name: The Leading Edge (TLE)
resources.description: Publishes technical advancements in seismic and geophysical methods.

resources.name: Oil & Gas Journal
resources.description: Industry-leading coverage on petroleum exploration and energy trends.

subcategories.name: Online News Platforms
subcategories.description: Digital platforms for geophysical and energy industry news:

resources.name: GeoExPro
resources.description: Articles on exploration, geophysics, and energy transition.

resources.name: Offshore Engineer
resources.description: Insights into offshore geophysics and subsea technologies.

resources.name: World Oil
resources.description: Reports on upstream exploration and drilling news.

subcategories.name: Market Analysis and Research Reports
subcategories.description: Resources for industry trends and market intelligence:

resources.name: S&P Global Energy Research
resources.description: Analysis on energy sector investments and seismic data markets.

resources.name: Wood Mackenzie
resources.description: Market intelligence for oil, gas, and energy transition.

resources.name: Rystad Energy
resources.description: Research on geophysical services and industry spending.

subcategories.name: Press Releases and Corporate Blogs
subcategories.description: Official announcements and insights from geophysical companies:

resources.name: Schlumberger Innovation Blog
resources.description: Updates on AI-driven seismic inversion and cloud geoscience.

resources.name: CGG Newsroom
resources.description: Case studies on multi-client seismic projects and carbon storage monitoring.

resources.name: TGS Press Releases
resources.description: Announcements on new seismic data acquisitions and AI exploration tools.

resources.name: ION Geophysical
resources.description: Insights into cutting-edge geophysical imaging and seismic data processing.

subcategories.name: Government and Regulatory Updates
subcategories.description: Official resources from government agencies and regulatory bodies:

resources.name: United States Geological Survey (USGS)
resources.description: Seismic hazard reports and earthquake risk assessments.

resources.name: British Geological Survey (BGS)
resources.description: Research on subsurface imaging and energy geoscience.

resources.name: Geoscience Australia
resources.description: Updates on geophysical surveys and mineral exploration projects.

subcategories.name: Industry Webinars and Live Updates
subcategories.description: Webinars and live updates from geophysical companies and organizations:

resources.name: SEG Webinars
resources.description: Webinars on various geophysical topics, including seismic data processing, interpretation and  machine learning applications.

resources.name: AAPG Discovery Thinking Series
resources.description: A series of webinars focusing on innovative thinking in geoscience and exploration.

resources.name: EAGE Conferences
resources.description: Events focusing on AI in geoscience and renewable energy applications.

subcategories.name: Geophysical Technology Startups
subcategories.description: Innovative companies advancing geophysical technologies:

resources.name: SAGA Robotics
resources.description: Developing autonomous drones for geophysical surveys.

resources.name: Seisintel
resources.description: AI-based seismic data analytics for offshore exploration.

resources.name: Xcalibur Multiphysics
resources.description: Advances in airborne geophysical exploration.

resources.name: Geophysical Technology, Inc. (GTI)
resources.description: Innovative geophysical solutions for subsurface exploration, enhancing seismic operational efficiency and earth imaging quality.

resources.name: Pixxel
resources.description: Developing a constellation of hyperspectral imaging satellites to provide high-resolution Earth observation data across various industries.

resources.name: Wheere
resources.description: Offers an indoor geolocation system capable of precise positioning even through substantial concrete barriers, utilizing low-frequency wave emission and advanced algorithms.

resources.name: Quaise Energy
resources.description: Aims to harness geothermal energy by drilling deeper into the Earth's crust using gyrotron technology to vaporize rock, accessing "superhot" rock for sustainable energy.

resources.name: Fervo Energy
resources.description: Utilizes advanced drilling techniques to enhance geothermal well outputs, providing renewable energy solutions for high-demand sectors like AI data centers.

resources.name: Fleet Space Technologies
resources.description: Combines low Earth orbit nanosatellites with ground-based sensors and AI to revolutionize minerals exploration, creating detailed 3D subsurface maps.

resources.name: Kapta Space
resources.description: Developing electronically steerable radar-based imaging technology for satellites, enabling faster and more precise scanning of large areas for various applications.

categories.name: Miscellaneous Resources
categories.description: A few additional resources to enhance your geophysical toolkit:

subcategories.name: Data Visualization Libraries
subcategories.description: Tools for visualizing geophysical data and results:

resources.name: Matplotlib
resources.description: Essential for 2D plotting in Python, commonly used in geophysics.

resources.name: Plotly

subcategories.name: Shell Scripting & Automation (Bash)
subcategories.description: Shell scripting is crucial for automating repetitive geophysical workflows.

resources.name: Shell Scripting Basics
resources.description:
- **Why Use Shell Scripting in Geophysics?**
  - Automate seismic data processing workflows.
  - Manage large datasets efficiently.
  - Run parallel computations on HPC clusters.
  - Preprocess and clean geophysical datasets before analysis.

resources.name: Key Commands
resources.description:
- **Key Shell Commands for Geophysicists:**
  - **`awk` & `sed`** - Process and clean seismic files.
  - **`grep` & `cut`** - Extract data from logs.
  - **`xargs` & `parallel`** - Batch processing.
  - **`ffmpeg`** - Convert geophysical images.
  - **`rsync` & `scp`** - Transfer large datasets.

resources.name: Example Script
resources.description:
```bash
# Rename all .sgy files to include date
for file in *.sgy; do
    mv "$file" "$(date +%Y%m%d)_$file"
done
```
